summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Finance Department - Office of the City Comptroller; authorizing a contract for expert and consultant services to develop and implement a central financial management system; authorizing interdepartmental agreements; creating and abrogating certain positions; creating a new program category and appropriate expenditure allowances in the 1978 Budget of the Finance Department - Office of the City Comptroller and increasing certain expenditure allowances in the 1978 Budgets of other Departments and Offices by reappropriation and transfer and by reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the Emergency therefor.
